ygData.subject: RE: Broken Song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d buy this except that with the money they have rolling in it wouldn t be a big proposition to do the minimal testing/consideration they aren t doing.
ygData.messageBody:
>I'm not sure it's the developers totally at fault on this one either.
>Unfortunately, I think once the game went live, the accountants took
>over and I strongly suspect that the development group is on a very low
>maintenance budget now. The speed at which changes are made, and the

I'd buy this except that with the money they have rolling in it wouldn't be
a big proposition to do the minimal testing/consideration they aren't doing.
Also the accountants would be doing everything they could to make sure that
gravy train never stops, which means they would be slowing down all changes
to make certain they did not piss anyone off and lose customers.
Looks more like sloppy developers too busy patting themselves on the back to
me. Hmmm, on second thought maybe they are all too busy playing EQ to
actually have time to code!

Kitasi
and don't tell any of my developers I said that! not that nay of my
developers would engage in such activity for longer than a 2 hour lunch
celebration
